The photograph was originally posted on: MATS on 16 August 2017, along with the caption "a miracle" (奇跡の一枚).
Several other photographs of the land fo: known as the Nekozaki Peninsula or "Kewpie Peninsula," were found, but none included a man resembling the mountain's proportions.
The locals refer to the land formation a: Kewpie Peninsula" because it resembles a sleeping Kewpie doll from the coast.
